statements: SELECT * FROM DemandMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, AVG(demand_value) as avg_demand FROM DemandMetrics GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM DemandMetrics WHERE product_id = 123 AND demand_value > 100
SELECT MIN(demand_value) as min_demand, MAX(demand_value) as max_demand FROM DemandMetrics
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM DemandMetrics GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM DemandMetrics WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, AVG(demand_value) AS avg_demand FROM DemandMetrics GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY avg_demand DESC;
SELECT product_id, MAX(demand_value) AS max_demand FROM DemandMetrics GROUP BY product_id HAVING max_demand > 500 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, AVG(demand_value) AS avg_demand, COUNT(*) AS demand_count FROM DemandMetrics GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY demand_count DESC, avg_demand ASC;
SELECT * FROM DemandMetrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' AND product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY demand_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, timestamp FROM dashboard_data WHERE demand_value > 100
SELECT id, demand_value FROM dashboard_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM visualization_data WHERE visualization_type = 'chart'
SELECT id, visualization_data FROM visualization_data ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, timestamp, demand_value FROM dashboard_data WHERE demand_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM visualization_data WHERE visualization_type = 'line_chart' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, timestamp, visualization_type, visualization_data FROM visualization_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT demand_value, id, timestamp FROM dashboard_data WHERE demand_value BETWEEN 50 AND 75 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT date, demand FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY date DESC, demand ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity, total_price FROM sales_data JOIN product_data ON sales_data.product_id = product_data.product_id WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT id, MIN(date) AS earliest_date, MAX(date) AS latest_date FROM dashboard_data;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM product_data GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Dashboard;
SELECT name, category FROM Dashboard WHERE category = 'Finance';
SELECT id, name, description FROM Dashboard ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, category FROM Dashboard WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM DemandFluctuations WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Dashboard;
SELECT name, category, description FROM Dashboard ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, category FROM Dashboard WHERE category='Finance';
SELECT d.name, v.type, df.date FROM Dashboard d JOIN Visualization v ON d.id = v.dashboard_id JOIN DemandFluctuations df ON d.id = df.dashboard_id WHERE v.type='BarChart';
SELECT u.theme, d.name, df.demand FROM UserSettings u JOIN Dashboard d ON u.dashboard_id = d.id LEFT JOIN DemandFluctuations df ON d.id = df.dashboard_id WHERE u.theme='Dark' ORDER BY df.demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data;
SELECT id, date, demand FROM dashboard_data WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_data ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_data WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT region_name, sales_target FROM region_data WHERE sales_target < 50000 ORDER BY sales_target DESC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_data WHERE category='Electronics' AND product_name LIKE 'Laptop%' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT region_name, SUM(sales_target) AS total_sales FROM region_data GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_sales > 50000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT date, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_name, department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employee_data GROUP BY department ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
